product_name: The North Face Snowtropolis Tall Boots - Women's
long_description: Find your way warmly and in one piece from the lodge to the ice rink with the waterproof, insulated women's Snowtropolis Tall boots from The North Face. Constructed with premium materials, these waterproof leather and suede boots pair with ample 200g PrimaLoft(R) Eco insulation for warmth during the coldest months. Sweater-knit cuffs exposed at the openings add appeal. Boots are lined with moisture-wicking Trek-Dry(R) linings. Compression-molded EVA midsoles and hardened EVA shanks provide solid support for long days on your feet. The North Face Snowtropolis Tall boots have medial waterproof zippers that allow easy on and off. Underneath, the TNF(TM) Winter Grip outsoles incorporate Ice Pick lugs for superior traction.
short_description: Find your way warmly and in one piece from the lodge to the ice rink with the waterproof, insulated women's Snowtropolis Tall boots from The North Face.
